reviewText: I would have have liked it if the format had been better. It needed to be in the building block format such as Amar Gamal's Mastering the dance. As it is there are so many combos with limited practice before moving on. It is easy to forget the earlier combos when learning the new ones if they are not linked together. I did not find this easy at all.
nothing elegant about this dance... it was a bust
its the most simple instructional easy to follow video i have come across. the music is great and the combinations and lessons are fun to do
